official_title: Prospective Multicenter Study to Measure the Impact of MMprofiler on Treatment Intention in Active Multiple Myeloma Patients
inclusion_criteria:
* Potentially multiple myeloma according to IMWG criteria
* Candidates for systemic treatment
Healthy volunteers allowed
Must have minimum age of 18 Years
exclusion_criteria:
* ECOG Performance Status > 3
* Tumor sample that fails QA or QC criteria for MMprofiler
